meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>use</kanji> something in a <kanji>cruel</kanji> way it's called <vocabulary>exploitation</vocabulary>. You're probably going to <vocabulary>overuse</vocabulary> it, at that rate too. Cut it out, dude.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
